CHAT.comment: JE , TP and CO are sitting around the block table; JF is getting out toys for them; before taping began , TP asked JF to get the toys

u.a: holds basket of small toys
points to top of cabinet
puts hand on basket on top of shelf

JF begins bringing down the marble tracks; TP , CO and JE continue playing with construction toys; TP and JE are singing "do , do , do do do" as they play; as JF puts first marble track down , AM runs into area and goes directly to it
no verbal response; JF gets a chair to reach other tracks
TP finds the hidden mic; JE notices and leans over to investigate
JE speaks into mic; distortion is overwhelming
pointing to mic
JE again speaks directly into mic; distortion and JE doesn't speak clearly
JF is setting up another track; CO comes over; just as she is about to touch the track , JE gets up and runs to it , getting in CO's way
CO steps back
JF starts handing out marbles to AM and JE for the marble track toys; TP runs over to get some; as children grab marbles out of JF's hand , some fall and roll away
JE gets down and gets rolling marbles; JE starts rollingthem down track; TP starts rolling his marbles down same track; AM is on first track; CO wanders around
JF is getting another marble track from cabinet; JF puts one down , CO goes to it; JE approaches JF
holds up one finger; JF gives him one marble; TP comes over for more marbles
JF gives TP more marbles
TP and JE roll marbles down track and then go back to JF
pointing to bottom of marble track; TP and JE start taking marbles out of track
trying to get marbles out
TP and JE get marbles out and roll them again
TP gets down and starts collecting marbles from bottom of track , like JE is doing; JE gives TP some marbles , then collects more
JF is talking to MA off camera; TP goes to other side of track , starts collecting marbles; JE comes over and starts collecting marbles too
screams
JF goes over to CO and gives her some marbles
TP and JE start rolling marbles; AM leaves area
TP and JE start rolling down marbles again
JE begins rolling marbles again

u.freecode: suddenly gets up and leaves area
u.a: JE rolls marbles , then leaves area; CO in area playing by herself; after long time CO leaves area too; <25 min>; LL enters area; picks up Lego blocks and begins playing at table; after a while AM enters area; LL suddenly gets up and runs to JF
LL goes back to table; AM follows and begins playing with Legos too
LL and AM play in parallel for a while; AM leaves area; after building train longer , LL goes to JF again
LL goes back and builds some more; <2 min>; LL leaves area and comes back with his mother
SA enters area; begins playing with marble tracks
LM leaves area; LL runs after
brings LM back , holding hand; KE and AN enter area and go to other marble track; LL watches SA and KE and AN play with marbles
LL begins building again; LM talks very quietly to LL
talking about trains

LM plays a while , then leaves; SA moves from his marble track to third one; AN goes over to SA's old marble track and collects marbles; KE comes over to help AN; SA moves third marble track to place in front of researcher
SA goes back to his old marble track
pointing; KE looks up

SA steps between AN and KE and moves entire marble track over three feet; KE goes back to their old track; AN goes to RS's track and collects marbles; after a few moments , SA runs off; AM enters area , goes to block table where LL is working; she starts pulling on Lego constructions and disrupting play; LL gets upset and runs off; AM continues to dump Legos on ground; KE approaches AM , then walks away to SA's marble track to get marbles; AN is already collecting some there; AM follows KE and almost bumps into AN
AN takes marbles to their track

KE walks back to their track; AM follows; AN says something to AM , walks over to SA's track and moves it a bit towards AM and goes back to their track; AM picks up track and moves it closer to KE and AN; they all begin rolling marbles
brings marbles over
shrugs her shoulders while looking at KE
picking up marbles
KE gives marbles to AM
AM goes back to her track , KE and AN go back to their track
AN puts marble down track
KE and AN begin rolling all their marbles down
starts gathering marbles at base of track
AM comes over and picks one up from floor
AN gives a marble from the base of track to AM; KE collects more marbles
AN starts collecting marbles too
sing-song; AM smiles and laughs
AM starts playing with Legos; KE and AN start rolling marbles again; AM starts talking to JF
holds up marble
AM and JF leave area; KE and AN watch them leave
AN gives marbles to KE; AN rolls some more marbles
they collect marbles
goes to other side of track
KE gets up , wanders around a bit , then goes over to the horse ranch setup; AN follows her over and moves a marble track over
KE goes over and brings their track closer to horse stable
they start playing; very difficult to hear due to camera trouble (5.)
unclear addressee
KE finishes putting horses in stable , then gets up and runs out
KE comes back in and begins playing with horses again
KE reaches over and gets a horse from AN
KE throws horse into stable
KE starts flying the horse and singing; AN starts collecting marbles from AM's track; KE helps AN
gets marbles , gets up , looks around for AM; AN and KE tiptoe back to stable with marbles; AN gets more marbles from AM's track; KE gets another block for the horse stable
getting marbles out of their own track
gets play stop sign and puts on stable
KE and AN go to a spotfeet away
KE and AN whisper
they go over to stable; unclear pretend play talk; (3.); KE and AN get up and leave
sing-song
